net.protheos.neural.hopfield

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.protheos.neural.hopfield.Layer

  • public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
    Layer Copyright 2005 by Jeff Heaton(jeff@jeffheaton.com) Example program from Chapter 2 Programming Neural Networks in Java http://www.heatonresearch.com/articles/series/1/ This software is copyrighted. You may use it in programs of your own, without restriction, but you may not publish the source code without the author's permission.       static double lambda

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Field Detail

      • lambda

        public static final double lambda
        A constant to multiply against the threshold function. This is not used, and is set to 1.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • threshold

        public boolean threshold(int k)
        The threshold method is used to determine if the neural network will fire for a given pattern. This threshold uses the hyperbolic tangent (tanh).
        Parameters:
        k - The product of the neuron weights and the input pattern.
        Returns:
        Whether to fire or not to fire.
